sentences.en: ...a circuit diagram.
sentences.cn: …电路图。

sentences.en: A DAU hardware block diagram is shown in Fig.
sentences.cn: 3.数据彩集器DAU硬件 的方框图如图3所示.

sentences.en: a diagram of the heating system
sentences.cn: 供热系统示意图

sentences.en: A diagram of the new road layout was superimposed on a map of the city.
sentences.cn: 新公路的规划示意图被叠映在该城市的地图上。

sentences.en: a diagram of the wiring system
sentences.cn: 线路系统图

sentences.en: a diagram representing a cross section of the human eye
sentences.cn: 表现人眼的剖面图

sentences.en: A family tree is a diagram with branches, showing how the members of a family are descended and related.
sentences.cn: 家谱是说明家族成员血缘承袭关系的明细分支图.

sentences.en: A table or diagram containing the name and address range of each peripheral addressable by the processor within the memory space.
sentences.cn: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

sentences.en: As you see in the diagram below, the first one usually starts from the left.
sentences.cn: 正如您在下面的图表中看到，第一个事务处理通常是从左边开始。

sentences.en: Compare this diagram with the one you used in the previous article.
sentences.cn: 将这个图表与前一篇文章中所使用的图表进行比较。

sentences.en: He drew a diagram to show us how to get to his house.
sentences.cn: 他画了一张草图,告诉我们到他家该怎么走.

sentences.en: Like any such diagram, it is a simplification.
sentences.cn: 像其他这种表格一样，这是简化了的。

sentences.en: On our project, we gradually decomposed each of the areas within the context diagram.
sentences.cn: 在我们的项目中，我们逐渐地分解环境图中的每个区域。

sentences.en: On the back of the letter was a diagram.
sentences.cn: 信的背面是张图表.

sentences.en: The data can be represented graphically in a line diagram.
sentences.cn: 这些数据可以用单线图表现出来.

sentences.en: The diagram schematizes the creation and consumption of wealth.
sentences.cn: 图表概述了财富的创造和消费。

sentences.en: The engineer drew a diagram of the bridge.
sentences.cn: 工程师绘制了一幅这座桥的示意图.

sentences.en: This diagram fits well into the article.
sentences.cn: 这张图表放在这篇文章中非常合适.

sentences.en: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
sentences.cn: 这个图表可说明我的意思.

sentences.en: This is a simpler diagram than the one I just showed you but the principles are the same.
sentences.cn: 这是一个比我刚展示的还要更简单的图解，但是原理是一样的。

sentences.en: This is represented in the schematic diagram below.
sentences.cn: 这正如下面的这幅简略图所示。

sentences.en: We reproduced a same working schematic diagram.
sentences.cn: 我们复制了一份同样的施工简图.

sentences.en: You can use this diagram.
sentences.cn: 你可以用这张图表。

phrases.tran_cn: [物理]（表示物质的各种相态平衡关系的）相图

trans.tran_en: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works
to show or represent something in a diagram
to show or represent something in a diagram
